title: Prevent a disconnected extension service to be unbind
message:
Prevent a disconnected extension service to be unbind

If a service is disconnected ifself or by the system, its service
connection reference is empty, but following an onExtensionsChanged
was detected that causes a establishAndDestroyConnections call that
tries to disconnect the service again, to lead DashClock to a FC
because of an "IllegalArgumentException: connection is null"
uncaught exception.

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

title: Merge pull request #839 from jruesga/master
message:
Merge pull request #839 from jruesga/master

Prevent SecurityExceptions to be forwarded to the host

title: Prevent SecurityExceptions to be forwarded to the host
message:
Prevent SecurityExceptions to be forwarded to the host

If the installed version of DashClock is a one which doesn't support
the new host api, we will get a SecurityException when trying to access
the DashClockService forwaded to the host client, instead of receive a
onMultiplexerChangedDetected(false) event.

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

title: Skip orphaned SMS messages. Fixes issue 8
message:
Skip orphaned SMS messages. Fixes issue 8

I've determined that phantom messages can show up when you delete a
conversation in the messaging app but for some reason the app
accidentally doesn't delete all messages in that conversation. So you're
basically left with stray messages that aren't part of a conversation.
The messaging app only shows conversations at the top-level, not
messages. DashClock was seeing those stray messages and showing them.
Now, it first collects a list of all active conversations, and then
checks to make sure unread messages are part of an active conversation
before showing it.

title: A bunch of fixes and some small new features:
message:
A bunch of fixes and some small new features:

- Don't show unread texts with an empty thread_id. Fixes issue 8.
- Ability to show appointments over 6 hours ahead. Fixes issue 14.
- Fixes empty region in weather display issue. Fixes issue 10.
- Force normal font size for clockface. Fixes issue 1.
- Missed calls from unknown contacts now shows number. Fixes issue 19.
- Fixes incorrect calendar time for 24h format. Fixes issue 46.

Also bumps version to 1.1.
